amendment.description: To increase funding for NASA aeronautics programs by $179,000,000 in fiscal year 2007, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3033 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3033 proposed by Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S2261-2262; text: CR S2262) To increase funding for NASA aeronautics programs by $179,000,000 in fiscal year 2007, with an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3033 proposed by Senator DeWine.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3033 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
